CustomField.formula: If(ISPICKVAL(amc__Status__c, "Complete") , 1 ,If(OR(amc__Total_Hours_Scheduled__c = 0, amc__Total_Hours_Completed__c = 0), If(amc__Total_Actions__c > 0, amc__Complete_Actions__c / amc__Total_Actions__c, 0), amc__Total_Hours_Completed__c / ( amc__Total_Hours_Completed__c + amc__Total_Projected_Hours_Remaining__c )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Status = Complete, will display 100%. If Hours Completed = 0 will display 0, otherwise Hours Completed / (Hours Completed + Hours Remaining)
CustomField.label: Milestone Completion Status
